snippet: A three-part documentary, on BBC World News, offers a trip through the maze of marketing and lobbying that revolutionized the food industry beginning about a half-century ago.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews three-part television documentary The Men Who Made Us Fat on BBC World News.
lead_paragraph: A three-part documentary, on BBC World News, offers a trip through the maze of marketing and lobbying that revolutionized the food industry beginning about a half-century ago.

headline.seo: ‘The Men Who Made Us Fat’ Finds Lots of Unhealthy Food
